sentences.sentence: The digital work is titled "Sophia Instantiation".
sentences.translation: 这件数字作品名为“索菲亚实例”。

sentences.sentence: Creating a new instance of a class is called instantiation.
sentences.translation: 创建类的新实例称为实例化。

sentences.sentence: Note: I discuss the instantiation of this pattern later in this article.
sentences.translation: 注意：我将在本文的后部讨论该模式的实例化。
